description: Sentiment analysis test cases for Reddit comment classification

cases.post_title: I built an app that tracks your daily habits
cases.post_body: After months of work, I'm launching my habit tracking app. It syncs across devices and has streak tracking.
cases.comment: This is exactly what I've been looking for! Just downloaded it. The UI is beautiful.

cases.post_title: I built an app that tracks your daily habits
cases.post_body: After months of work, I'm launching my habit tracking app.
cases.comment: Congrats on launching! I know how much work goes into these projects. Will definitely try it.

cases.post_title: I built an app that tracks your daily habits
cases.post_body: After months of work, I'm launching my habit tracking app.
cases.comment: Love the concept! Would be great if you added calendar integration. Happy to be a beta tester.

cases.post_title: I built an app that tracks your daily habits
cases.post_body: After months of work, I'm launching my habit tracking app.
cases.comment: Interesting. What tech stack did you use to build this?

cases.post_title: I built an app that tracks your daily habits
cases.post_body: After months of work, I'm launching my habit tracking app.
cases.comment: Is this available on Android or just iOS?

cases.post_title: I built an app that tracks your daily habits
cases.post_body: After months of work, I'm launching my habit tracking app.
cases.comment: How does this compare to Habitica or Streaks?

cases.post_title: I built an app that tracks your daily habits
cases.post_body: After months of work, I'm launching my habit tracking app.
cases.comment: Another habit tracker? There are already like 50 of these on the app store.

cases.post_title: I built an app that tracks your daily habits
cases.post_body: After months of work, I'm launching my habit tracking app.
cases.comment: The UI looks dated. Also, why does it need so many permissions? Hard pass.

cases.post_title: I built an app that tracks your daily habits
cases.post_body: After months of work, I'm launching my habit tracking app.
cases.comment: Wow, another habit tracker! How original! /s

cases.post_title: I built an app that tracks your daily habits
cases.post_body: After months of work, I'm launching my habit tracking app.
cases.comment: I tried it and it crashes every time I try to add a new habit. Uninstalled.

cases.post_title: I built a budgeting tool for freelancers
cases.post_body: As a freelancer myself, I got frustrated with existing tools and built my own.
cases.comment: As a fellow freelancer, I feel this so hard. Tax season is always a nightmare. Signing up now!

cases.post_title: Free tool I made to help with job searching
cases.post_body: I was laid off last year and built this to help with my own job search. Sharing it free.
cases.comment: You're a legend for making this free. This would have saved me so much time last month!

cases.post_title: AI-powered writing assistant I created
cases.post_body: Uses GPT-4 to help with writing emails and documents.
cases.comment: Does this actually work well or is it just another ChatGPT wrapper?

cases.post_title: I built a personal finance tracker
cases.post_body: Connect your bank accounts and get insights into your spending.
cases.comment: So you want access to all my bank data? No thanks. This screams data breach waiting to happen.

cases.post_title: Beta testing my new productivity app
cases.post_body: Looking for early users to test and provide feedback.
cases.comment: Count me in! I love trying new productivity tools. Just signed up for the beta.

cases.post_title: Open source alternative to Notion I built
cases.post_body: Self-hostable and privacy-focused note-taking app.
cases.comment: What database does it use under the hood? SQLite or PostgreSQL?

cases.post_title: Simple timer app for focus sessions
cases.post_body: No frills pomodoro timer with nice sounds.
cases.comment: Looks clean. Might give it a try.

cases.post_title: I made a to-do list app
cases.post_body: Simple and minimal task management.
cases.comment: This offers nothing that Apple Reminders doesn't already do for free.

cases.post_title: Chrome extension for saving articles
cases.post_body: One-click save articles to read later.
cases.comment: Just shared this with my whole team. We've been looking for something exactly like this!

cases.post_title: Task management app with AI prioritization
cases.post_body: Uses AI to help prioritize your daily tasks.
cases.comment: Does it integrate with Google Calendar? That would be essential for my workflow.
